text:
@SpaceX @EricBlake12 Maybe the two luckiest guys in the world. Alive but not on Earth. 

#BlackLivesMatter #BLM #GeorgeFloyd #pandemic #COVID19 #SpaceXLaunch #SpaceX

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

entity.name: SpaceX launches Crew Dragon with two NASA astronauts onboard
entity.description: NASA astronauts Doug Hurley and Bob Behnken are now on their way to the ISS aboard SpaceX’s Crew Dragon. The flight marks the first-ever crewed space launch by a private company, and is the first crewed NASA launch from US soil since 2011.

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

domain.name: Brand Category
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands
